scripts.build-engine: npm run build:darwin && npm run build:linux && npm run build:windows
scripts.build:darwin: cd engine && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../bin/engine-darwin-amd64 main.go && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../bin/engine-darwin-arm64 main.go
scripts.build:linux: cd engine && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../bin/engine-linux-amd64 main.go && GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../bin/engine-linux-arm64 main.go
scripts.build:windows: cd engine && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../bin/engine-windows-amd64.exe main.go && GOOS=windows GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../bin/engine-windows-arm64.exe main.go
